title: Welcome back...
body:
Hey everyone! Welcome to the NEW Moxie Blog. Feel free to mouse around and poke anything you want. A lot of stuff has been moved around, but it's not terribly difficult to relocate. That last sentence had two meanings! Be sure to check back later, b/c from hence forth, The Moxie Blog is going to be a multi-post... as in, several per day... well, per WEEK day. They'll be a lot smaller than what you're used to, but "them or the marry her!" Right? Right? Can I get a "woot woot?"

Also, if you haven't done so already, please update your bookmarks and links to blog.moxiecinema.com. Urlblue.com will remain active, but only as a redirect. Woo hoo!
author: Dan

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body:
First commentor on the new look blog!

Woot woot!!

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body:
I assume every post will still appear on the main blog page?

Also, 'Fyse's Floating Face'? Where'd that come from?!

However, I'm obviously now going to rechristen my blog. Perhaps I'll make you my blog's official godfather, in honour of your superior naming skills...

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: It came from the picture of your face floating at the top of your blog... thus, Fyse's Floating Face. I'm also a sucker for alliteration.

comments.author: einahpets
comments.body: I found a typo. The small text underneath the links. It says it doesn't me I don't like you...But I like the template. Nice and clean looking.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Doh! That's what I get for writing it at 10:15 in the evening!

comments.author: Lor
comments.body:
Happy New Blog Day!

Have you named the little robot on the screen? You should give him/her a quirky little name.

In closing, woot woot.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Lor: his name is Benzo. He moderates the interview in the R.A.Q..

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Oz, that "woot woot" seemed a tad less than enthusiastic.

comments.author: Oz
comments.body: Don't blame me.  You specifically asked for a "woot woot?" so that's what you got.  Now, if you had asked, "Can I get a 'woot woot'?" I would have responded in an entirely different manner.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Damn my hide! You're right. I deserved that "woot woot?"!

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: maybe i missed this before, but where did urlblue.com originally come from - any story behind it?

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Matt: it didn't have any particular meaning... just one of the many domain names I had lying about.
